website_summaries.verdict: A set of 4 flexible wall mounts that hold your controllers securely.
pros: By bending the flexible wires, it's easy to get a perfect fit for your DualShock 4, or any other controller
cons: The wires can slip a bit in the mount since they are not directly attached

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is THANK YOU hopefully this will keep my sons stuff off the floor. I used sterile crates I got from Walmart for 88c to complete this look(organizer). I will be buying 2 more sets to do the same in my other 3 boys room. One thing... when adding the plastic caps dont over screw/drill them, one of them broke/flew off as I was trying to tighten em. Can't beat the price. Wish they had other colors tho. One of them I used for the bathroom with that been said let your imagination fly while using this.
customer_reviews.author: Mrz.Kay

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer shrank the hooks down without notifying the customer.
customer_reviews.text: Manufacturer decided to cheap out on the consumer. I ordered these in the recent past and they were all much bigger hooks than these are here. These here have been reduced in size by at least 30 percent. Its absolutely ridiculous that they would charge 17.50 with tax for four hooks, and the manufaturer had the cojones to make them smaller and less useful. About the only thing these hooks will fit is a PS3 controller, and if that's all you have then I question if its necessary to buy hooks in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: They work pretty good. Wish they came with extra mounts but ...
customer_reviews.text: I got them to hold up a keyboard. The only surprise was they were thicker then I expected. They work pretty good. Wish they came with extra mounts but that is easily resolved with a trip the the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: deathknight8338

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and Mount | Wish they were a bit more locked in place
customer_reviews.text: Installing these was a breeze. I have 2 Xbox controllers, 1 Switch Pro and 1 Switch (in grip) mounted on them. Getting them all level is the most time consuming part, and a bit tricky considering their small top. The arms themselves are adjustable, allowing you to get as tight or snug a fit for your various controllers. Wish once they were mounted on the wall, they didn't swivel as much/as easily. It's not that bad, however, over time you'll likely need to keep adjusting the mount due to the controllers shifting it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Antill

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The piece that attaches the wire parts to the desk/wall is really cheap. You'd have to go to the hardware store and find a sturdier substitute. For $15, that piece shouldn't be this cheap. It also doesn't grasp the wire closely so the controller sways (mine is hung from my desk) when I set it in the wire. These might be ok for the wall since you have a back, but if your intent was to hang it off my desk, I'd pass on this one.
customer_reviews.author: hiroze

customer_reviews.title: These things are great.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for getting controllers up off the floor or table. I have mine installed on the wall behind my media cabinet. I hit two studs and had to use the anchors for the other two. Seems to hold up really well. I am using two Xbox One controllers and two Wii U Pro Controllers. They are totally adjustable so the analog sticks/buttons are not depressed in any way. I think it could be a little cheaper. Like maybe $15 instead of $18. Then I would buy four more.
customer_reviews.author: italianprog

customer_reviews.title: Infinitely moldable for any game console controllers oem or after market.
customer_reviews.text: All hw needed came with product. If you have multiple gaming platforms, ( xbox, xbox one, ps3,4 etc) you should buy at least 8 holders so you get your value out of the free shipping. We use all 8 holders and they are flexible to whatever you need to make ANY brand of controllers work. Read the install instructions, locate the holes, do a predrill pilot hole then install.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Keezer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those with multiple types of controllers!
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me and have a steam controller, switch, switch pro, PS4, and Xbox controllers, then you know not every controller mount will work. The great thing about these is that they are adjustable so I was able to hang every controller I own! The package also comes with all the mounting hardware you will need, including drywall anchors, which is a nice touch. These are not as minimalist as some other hangers, but for my needs nothing can beat them. I would highly recommend for those that have multiple types of controllers!
customer_reviews.author: Craig D.

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that these hooks are made of a ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my grand baby because these controllers are expense and we needed a place for them to be protected from getting lost or stepped on. I place the hooks right by her game. Very convenient for her to find her gaming stuff. I love the fact that these hooks are made of a flexible material so you can adjust to fix your controller.
customer_reviews.author: MSW

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mount, holds custom controllers
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Mine rocked side to side when mounted under my desk Pros: Easy to install, holds my SCUF controllers, flexible I've used this for PS4 and Xbox controllers and had no issues. I think it's the way I mounted it under my desk, but it swings freely back and forth. It's not a real issue, it just makes it so the controller doesn't sit properly at first. The arms are flexible so it should fit the size of most controllers, and they can easily be mounted on a wall or desk. I recommend this for a custom look for controller storage.
customer_reviews.author: The World's Worst Rapper // Magician // Tech Vlogger // Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, 100%
customer_reviews.text: I was looking on Amazon for something that would hold my kids controllers, and it seem like a endless task. While the adhesive holders might of worked, eventually they could fail from the constant weight change of removing and adding your controller. These holders on the other hand will last just as long as the wall/desk/cabinet/entertainment center you add them too. They are easy to install, moldeable to any controller, and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: slides all over the place! Not good for displaying your controller might even break it!
customer_reviews.text: I like the bendable style, but thats where it ends. in order to mount it you put the flexible bar through a clip that is 5 sizes to big end result it slides all over the place. you may even go to reach for it and the controller could easily sideways and fall and break as mine did. I had to wrap electrical tape in the place where the clip fits because IT IS 5 SIZES TOO BIG!!! hope the manufacturer fixes this otherwise do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome.
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for a controller project I'd had for a long time. The instructions were clearly written. You can put so many different types of controllers on these books and it takes them all well. No controller has too much pressure or sharp points that might cause damage. Be prepared with a sturdy drill!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy hardware, but good product
customer_reviews.text: This item is great if you change the hardware. Used to hold 4 controllers under my arcade cabinet. It comes with some very flimsy plastic wire fasteners. These will definitely not work well. Changed them for some metal ones from Amazon and now the product is perfect. Would give 5 stars if hardware provided was better!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Buttazzoni

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust and look great in video game room
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of these when I hung them up. I wasn't too impressed with the hardware sent with it, but used my own. I only have 2 being used right now for my Xbox Elite controller and my Covert Forces controller. I didn't realize I could probably use these for my turtle beach headphones as well. I might end up doing that with both sets of headphones later on if my command hook doesn't work. Worth the price since I haven't been able to find adjustable mounts anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Inc

customer_reviews.title: I'll be buying more of these, easiest way to organize controllers of all shapes and sizes
customer_reviews.text: Good solution for controllers everywhere! Our garage theater setup is a gaming room. Keeping tools and shop equipment organized as well as console stuff protected and out of harm's way... equally important in my case. Don't want to step on a joycon while working on a car. These do the job well!
customer_reviews.author: shane southwood

customer_reviews.title: Great Mounts for a Low Price
customer_reviews.text: At first glance these mounts may look cheap but they are perfect for mounting almost anything. They are made out of a metal bar with rubber that is very flexible. They are very easy to hang and hold a lot of stuff. Not just controllers. I have been using them also to hang my VR headset and controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Stan L.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect, I didn't use the hardware to hang it as that seemed a little overkill so I just used regular hanging nail instead of a drywall anchor. Figured remotes were light enough and this seems to work just fine. Very happy and remotes are up and away from the desk to it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Murph

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: I like this. I bought it for my gameroom for my kids to l because they have the habit of losing controllers and leaving them anywhere. Only thing I don't like is that the right analog button is pushed over by the bar for the Xbox controller. Other than that I love it and it was easy to install using my power drill.
customer_reviews.author: msowens85

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product. Best Bang For your Buck!
customer_reviews.text: First time buying controller wall hangers and glad I purchased these. Best bang for your buck. You get 4 for the price of two. Very easy to install. I really like that you can form the wire however you need to use it. I had an extra one and used it to hang an ukulele which is amazing because 1 guitar wall hanger is equal to this pricing or even more. The only issue is that these can be easily shifted when grabbing your controller or headset. It’s not a big problem for me but maybe for someone who gets easily triggered haha.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for PS4 Controllers
customer_reviews.text: These are really good. I bought for ps4 and xbox one controllers. I must say though the ps4 controllers fit a lot better than the xbox one controllers. I would definitely buy for ps4 controllers. Might wanna look for something a little different if you have xbox one controllers though.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Morris

customer_reviews.title: great helmet hanging
customer_reviews.text: got these at a great price to make a mounting place for 4 dirt bike helmets. these hooks work perfectly for that purpose when mounted to wood. unfortunate negatives are that the hanger hook is plastic - as is the screw cover and washer. 1 washer broke when mounting - but the set came with a couple extras. i took a trip to the hardware for metal hanger hooks so that i wan't disappointed with the furnished plastic ones breaking. great otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Russell R. Herman

customer_reviews.title: You need these if you play video games!
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have for anyone with video games! So you just screw in the sheetrock screws and put them up and you just bend the arms into what ever the shape of your controller is! Looks great on my wall, super easy to use, everyone compliments them. Would recommend to anyone and everyone! Going to buy more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I installed these on the side of my entertainment stand. They are very easy to put on and fit all of my controllers. I will be buying more to hang the rest of my controllers. PS - I hung my Xbox one, PS4, Switch, PS2, and xbox 360 controllers. Bends easily to fit any controller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never had a controller fall.. Even after an earthquake
customer_reviews.text: Holds Xbox one, playstation, and joycon controller (without joycons) with no problems. I have them mounted to a stud, and none of them fell after the 5.7 earthquake we had just short of 10 miles from our house. Things around the room were toppling over left and right but the cotrollers didn't even move.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Lewis

customer_reviews.title: These work great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and adjust to whatever controller you are using. I have a ps4, Xbox a, and some mod controllers and they all work. The bars are bendable to adjust to your controller. The installation is easy and really impossible to install wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased, Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: The hangers were durable in material, the coating will prevent slipping, and adjustable without being too easy to bend so they will maintain their shape. Thankfully the picture is self explanatory, as there are no actual mounting instructions. However. If youve never used mounting anchors before, it may be a little more difficult for users.
customer_reviews.author: KeiriSato

customer_reviews.title: These have helped me organize my gaming room. I ...
customer_reviews.text: These have helped me organize my gaming room. I have two areas for gaming and this simplified the storage of my controllers. They also take up some empty wall-space. The "arms" are bendable and can conform to your controllers. They are semi-tacky and arms tend to "grab" the controllers. Which is a minor quibble. Edit 9-9-2020: I have also used 60% and full sized keyboards in these. The do an admirable job.
customer_reviews.author: randomlyerratic

customer_reviews.title: Works good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I plan to upload pics after work today. They bend and work well for ps4 controllers and Xbox one controllers. The issue is the hoop that attaches to the wall is too big and the holding wire slides back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy set and easy to mold any controller. Also super great for decorating that seconds as storage.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon

customer_reviews.title: Great product for new and retro gamers
customer_reviews.text: Product is fantastic. They are bendable but also will hold their shape to make the perfect custom holder for any controller. New or old. The smooth rubber coating makes it perfect for controllers you would rather not scuff up. Great product and will definitely buy more if I have a need for more. My one beef is it should come with a non-screw version like a sticky command strip to just fasten to the wall. I am trying to configure a way to fasten these to the wall using some command strips I have on hand, but it is being a little difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Lemantine

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of controller clutter!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great storage solution for all controllers. No more picking them up all over the place. They are very easy to install but can slide around in the mount. No complains at all.
customer_reviews.author: J.AX

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Moldable to fit many devices, however the wire inside is pretty thick so it's recommended to bend the shape you want before attaching it to the wall to prevent stress on the fixture. Looks clean and holds all my controllers and headphones without clutter.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Lord

customer_reviews.title: Great way to organize your gaming controllers.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice hangers for keeping your controllers organized for charging and just keeping them out of the way in general. They are bendable so you can adjust them to fit most any controller. We are using for PS4 and Nintendo Switch Pro controllers with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Doodle™

customer_reviews.title: They work as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: A great purchase. These controller holders are lightweight and easily mounted to a wall or furniture. In my case, I mounted them to my tv stand. Comes with screws and wall anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Schendorf

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these they work great for my tv remote and controllers my only negative is the part that connects it to the wall it feels a little cheap
customer_reviews.author: Zack D.

customer_reviews.title: Controllers out of kids reach
customer_reviews.text: I like these but they tend to spin a bit on the wall. The arms will stay held but when dropping a controller on them you've got to be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: Very flexible
customer_reviews.text: These are Great Wall mounts for most any controller you have. You can bend the arms to create more or less space which is wonderful, and adjust the width so you can use these for many different types of controllers. Overall I’m very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cateyedprincess

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product!
customer_reviews.text: These hooks are badass. They took my controllers from wild, free, and tangled, to orgainzed, classy, and ready-to-go at a moment's notice. They fit any controller from a WiiU gamepad, to the pokeball controller for Let's Go Eevee. Every gamer needs these.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Leach

customer_reviews.title: A definite must have!
customer_reviews.text: Holds n64 controllers, gamecube, sega. With you being able to bend the hanger, you can bend it to fit any controller. I will be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Dorian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for having gaming controllers and other styff
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, love how they are flexible you can widen them up if you want, they are also good for hanging my bags lol. Highly recommend for holding game controllers, head phones they won’t fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Atxseven

customer_reviews.title: Fit every controller I have
customer_reviews.text: Wow! - Look at the picture. They are light and yet durable to my need. They adjust easily to hold any controller I have and I like my gaming station!!
customer_reviews.author: Baracuda1956

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple product, but does what it's supposed to do. A bit pricey, but if you have a need for a product like this I say it's worth a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you need
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you should expect. They bend to assist full grasp of the controllers and mount easily. I wanted to create an entertainment organizer because the price or quality of those offered weren't appealing to me. It was fairly easy and I believe turned out quite well. Enjoy and recommend the product!
customer_reviews.author: Ben S

customer_reviews.title: Effective.
customer_reviews.text: Great way to organize my controllers and wires. Ordered 2 sets and they look ok on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Jones

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you think
customer_reviews.text: Used thes for two Xbox one controller and two PS4 controllers. The ability to reshape these is awesome. The installation is easy. MAKE SURE NOT TO OVER TIGHTEB TGE SCREW. THE PLASTIC WASHERS CAN SNAP.
customer_reviews.author: EscapeTheSpace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as shown, Very flexible for whatever shape or size you need it to be and holds great.
customer_reviews.author: David baker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for ! Hung these below my sons tv and the controllers easily go right on and it looks so cool! My son loves them !
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Mounted these to side of my kids desk to hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Mounted these to side of my kids desk to hold the PS4 and Xbox remotes. The mounts are flexible to contort to various different shapes of the remotes and to hold them securely.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Flexible !
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I needed something to hold up our gaming accessories. This works great. If took him like 5 minutes to set up . Works great for gaming headset and PS4 controller. You do have to bend it to fit the dimensions but it's pretty flexible
customer_reviews.author: Carla Cook

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Item works great, exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Blake D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Bendable, adjustable to any size or shape controller.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Holds your controllers.
customer_reviews.text: It works and holds my controllers. Was tried of them laying around. The unit will tilt from side to side but they don't drop the controller. Just doesn't look as neat as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan H.

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this item twice love the ease of installation
customer_reviews.author: Juan Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Zoom in!
customer_reviews.text: I thought the bendable bars would just have a hook pre-attached to them, but they're seperate and slip quite a bit even when you mount them. Other than that, they bend and support all my stuff perfectly. Zooming in now I can see that they're seperate in the picture
customer_reviews.author: GellinMagellan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This Game Controller Organizer is just what I needed. Easy to install, the arms are stiff but movable. Holds my game controller and headphone nicely!.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: The end caps come off easily. While they do their purpose I do think ...
customer_reviews.text: After about a year of use I do have to say that I would not purchase again. The end caps come off easily. While they do their purpose I do think that they can make them a bit smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Echo

customer_reviews.title: Looks so much better hung up!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Exactly what I was looking for. Controllers are above the sound bar now and off the consoles. Easily held the ps4 and Xbox one controllers!
customer_reviews.author: juggalettekt

customer_reviews.title: Looked nicer than I initially thought
customer_reviews.text: Quality for how cheap they are. Look nice. I really like the fact they are bendable and you can adjust it to fit pretty much any controller because of that. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ohno

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love them. They bend and can adjust to any remote!! Easy to install. Must have! Great for organizing
customer_reviews.author: Faiths Wings- Crystal Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Is it good enough??
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, very stable, holds many different types of game controls, easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Gigglegig

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: They work great. I’m really just now getting my video game collection started and I wanted something to display my GameCube and N64 controllers and these seemed like the best thing. I do live in a dorm so I wasn’t sure if I would be able to use command strips to hang them up but it works just fine. My only issue is that they don’t work well with the N64 because of how bulky the controller is, but these were made for newer game controllers so I don’t mind a bit. Overall very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Roe

customer_reviews.title: Controller hangers .
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wall mounts . Drilled small holes through my metal tv stand and used sheet metal screws , worked like a charm. Bought 2 sets and used them all. Thank you for A great product.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and the hanger is flexible and easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and the hanger is flexible and easy to mold into a shape to hold a controller or headset. Great way to finish off a gaming wall.
customer_reviews.author: john richardson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband’s man cave and he loves it. He says it is easy to install and fits all kinds of controllers.

customer_reviews.title: worked great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, able to mold them to what I want them to hold.

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable and not hard to look at
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Planning to buy an extra set for the console in the other room.

customer_reviews.title: Great organization!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this! Great for organizing gaming controllers and headsets!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: love these, I even set one up to hold the xbox and tv remotes.

customer_reviews.text: Items work as described. Well made and really flexible making them useful for more things then I originally planned. Can be easily bent without damage.

customer_reviews.text: These items were exactly as described and they came very quickly

customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and easy to use. So far, I have only used these to mount my routers to the wall.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work and are pretty decent if you just want to get some order to your controllers.

customer_reviews.text: Will hold any controller, small keyboard and mice. just dealing with the cord isnt fun

customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, works with small and huge controllers (such as the Hyperkin Duke) very well, and comes with everything you need for mounting.

customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 orders of these that were supposed to be 8 total. I only got 6 which is upsetting. They look great though. Annoyed I got less than what i paid for.

customer_reviews.title: Holder is sturdy but mounting clip is flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic mount is too big for holder, seems flimsy and easliy breakable... only time will tell. Malleable holder, however, is sturdy and flexible. No instructions included, although setup is simple enough.

customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this product five stars because of how fast it arrived, how well it was packed and how easy it was to set up. I really liked the way it turned out.

product_meta.title: YYST Universal Game Controller Organizer Wall Rack Wall Mount Wall Clip Wall Hanger for Xbox One PS4 Switch Pro Game Controller 4/PK - NO Game Controller - No Falling
product_meta.description:
you are purchasing 4 game controller organizers- New Design Fit game controllers better (NO GAME CONTROLLER INCLUDED) 
1. 4 bendable hangers,4 R-rings and 4 screws. Game controller only for display, not included. Color : Black. 
2. NO Falling - The rack holds the controller securely. No falling if anything bumps the wall. Please see Figure 4. No matter how you tilt, the game controller always stays in the rack. 
3. Rubber protection. The hanger is wrapped with rubber, so please don't worry about the scratches. 
4. Suitable for your most old and retro controllers. PS4 controllers.The distance between the branches is adjustable, you can expand or grip it to fit your controller.
feature_bullets: 1. 4 bendable hangers,4 R-rings and 4 screws. Game controller only for display, not included. Color : Black.
2. NO Falling - The rack holds the controller securely. No falling if anything bumps the wall. Please see Figure 4. No matter how you tilt, the game controller always stays in the rack.
3. Rubber protection. The hanger is wrapped with rubber, so please don't worry about the scratches.
4. Suitable for your most old and retro controllers. PS4 controllers.The distance between the branches is adjustable, you can expand or grip it to fit your controller.

NEW DESIGN- No More Bulky AND More Safe And Invisible - We have shrank the long tips of the rack (as many people suggested)) to reduce the bulky tips to become no more bulky，slim and fit with game controllers better and more beautiful. No worrying about the grab strength - the rack still works for all types of game controllers. Hide the screws behind the game controller . Unobtrusive - The game controller will become a beautiful display on the wall with unobtrusive racks.
